42706.name: Oil - Trade 2015 - 2016 - Crude Exports - Million tonnes
42706.description: Oil trade in 2015 and 2016 - Crude Exports - Million tonnes Notes: Bunkers are not included as exports. Intra-area movements (for example, between countries in Europe) are excluded.Crude imports and exports include condensates.
